speaker: Gabrielle
content: I found my earrings. We can go now.

speaker: Carlos
content: The lawn hasn't been mowed. I've had it. We're getting a real gardener.
mark: I've had it 我受够了

speaker: Carlos
content: Are you deaf? I just said he's not doing his job.

speaker: Gabrielle
content: It's dark. You just can't see that the lawn has been mowed.

speaker: Carlos
content: It hasn't been. Feel this grass.

speaker: Gabrielle
content: I'm not feeling the grass. Let's just get going. Come on, we're late.
mark: Let's just get going 咱们这就出发吧
Let’s just keep going. 我们继续走吧 / 继续做吧

speaker: Carlos
content: There's Tanaka. Time for me to go into my dance.
mark: Time for me to go into my dance. 该是我上场的时候了，我觉得可以说 Time for me to do my thing. 或者 It’s my turn. 更常用

speaker: Gabrielle
content: Good luck, sweetheart. Excuse me. You see that man just walked away? Can you make sure he has a drink in his hand all night long.
mark: all night long 整夜地，通宵地

speaker: valet
mark: valet n. 贴身男仆；用车的人；伺候客人停车
